CatDescriptText: Fashion model Louie Smith was also the first black tipstaff (sheriff's officer; bailiff) hired by the City of Pittsburgh.  His career as a model developed in the late 1940s and 50s.  Charles "Teenie" Harris probably hand colored this print himself.
TitMainTitle: Fashion model Louie Smith wearing ascot and two-toned shoes, holding camera and hat, standing near ferns, in Harris Studio
